codebrains.crazysellout.Adapters

Class ProductsExpandableListAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseExpandableListAdapter
      • codebrains.crazysellout.Adapters.ProductsExpandableListAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.ExpandableListAdapter, android.widget.HeterogeneousExpandableList

    public class ProductsExpandableListAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseExpandableListAdapter
    Class that handles the data inside the products expandable list.
